author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
The tech world is abuzz with all the supposed AI technologies that we never hear the end of. Apple Intelligence. Windows Copilot. Google Gemini. And you're even being told to buy AI enabled devices like Copilot+ PC's or iPhone 16's. Yet the truth is that today, this is all vaporware. 

And even more interesting a clear release date on these products is not even avaiable yet. All we see are little AI gimmicks like background blur.

But this is not the time to relax. While it seems like AI is not a current threat, the reality is that the more dangerous pieces of AI Agents are already active.

title: Is the AI Companion a Failed Concept? Or Wait for Other Shoe to Drop?
